name: Ka'Poon!
description:
Ka'Poon

Gather your friends and see who is the fittest to survive!

Stranded on an island, these people have no choice but to fight to the death in this free-for-all first person shooter!

Be the first to survive three rounds and win the game! However, be accurate because you only have three spears. Make sure to pick them back up if you miss! And don't forget, powerups can change the tide of battle!

Ka'Poon is meant to replicate the nostalgia of local multiplayer FPSs. This game uses gamepads and supports many!

  • DualShock 3 and 4 Gamepads
  • Xbox 360 and Xbox One Gamepads
  • Logitech F310 and F710
  • Mayflash Gamecube Controllers and Switch Pro Controller
  • Buffalo USB SNES Controller
